name: 曹筱玥
objective:
有鑒於國內的教育制度主張男女擁有平等的權利，但實際結果卻是女學生在理工科系方面成為少數族群，本課程以增進女性參與人機互動為主要目標，結合一連串的研習營教學與展示技術的引入，教導有關互動科技技術等相關應用，並透過了解性別研究的主要流派與其理論，來確認性別研究與互動設計的性質與功能，期待學生能再了解性別研究的主要理論後，能把它應用於互動設計以及創意發想上，以因應未來女性經濟力的快速掘起。
The education system of Taiwan claims that men and women are equal. The truth is that female students are only a minority of the department of the science and engineering, not to mention the percentage of the further education in this field. Based on this concept, we plan the interactive curriculum. We will go to give instruction about the interactive technology. In order to test the spot reaction and track the reaction after the exhibition when the exhibition is ongoing, we will apply Radio-frequency identification. The outdoor education and the indoor education; the two complement each other and expecting this exhibition to encourage more female students to discovery the science and have better achievements in this field.
